amendatorysection.bookinfo: Uniform Commercial Code, Revised Statutes Cumulative Supplement, 2024
amendatorysection.catchline: Waiver or renunciation of claim or right after default.
amendatorysection.para: Any claim or right arising out of an alleged default or breach of warranty may be discharged in whole or in part without consideration by a waiver or renunciation in a signed record delivered by the aggrieved party.
